mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_APP( name, code, sort, createTime, isEnable ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{sort}, #{createTime}, #{isEnable} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM SYS_APP a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.isEnable = #{isEnable}
ORDER BY a.sort DESC, a.createTime DESC
SELECT * FROM SYS_APP a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.code = #{code}
